text: Lakini mtula ndagu ayo hebu munhu ayo yalotaga nzozi yakomigwe, kwavija kowafunza iwanhu wamuleme Mndewa Imulungu, Imulungu wenu, yawalavile mwiisi ya Misili na kuwagombola kulawa muutumwa, heyo kageza kuwatenda sikumuikweleleze nzila iyawalagize Mndewa Imulungu, Imulungu wenu muikweleleze. Muwakome ili musegese gehile hagati yenu.
